name: Repair Time Lite - Repair Broken Pieces
name_original: Repair Time Lite - Repair Broken Pieces
description:
Repair Time is a very simple but fun game. The goal is to rebuild the broken pieces as fast as you can.

Features:
* 5 Levels
* 3 Difficulty Levels
* Scores
* iPad Retina and iPhone 5, 6, 6+ Support
